PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : an integer vector with 8 entries (see below)
: an integer containing a date coded in second from 1 Jan 1970

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_ITEM: =getdate() returns the current date in format given below:
: The year as a number (with the century) between 0000 and 9999.
: The month of the year as a number between 01 and 12.
: The ISO 8601 week number as a number between 01 and 53.
: The Julian day of the year as a number between 001 and 366.
: Specifies the weekday as a decimal number [1,7], with 1 representing Sunday.
: The day of the month as a number between 01 and 31.
: The hour of the day as a number between 00 and 23.
: The minute as a number between 00 and 59.
: The second is output as a number between 00 and 59.

DESCRIPTION_ITEM.label: x =getdate('s'), returns a scalar with the number of seconds since Jan

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_ITEM: =getdate(x) ,format the date given by x (number of seconds since Jan 1, 1970, 00:00 UTC) in format given above:
